Episodes.Title: Orange Juice, No Pulp
Episodes.Actors: Nathan Fielder, Gigi Burgdorf, K. Todd Freeman
Episodes.Plot: Nathan Fielder helps a Brooklyn-based trivia aficionado come clean to his teammate about a long-held lie.

Episodes.Title: Scion
Episodes.Writer: Nathan Fielder, Carrie Kemper, Eric Notarnicola
Episodes.Actors: Nathan Fielder, Charlie Cherman, Ulla Feldman
Episodes.Plot: Nathan allows an Oregon woman to prepare for motherhood by simulating the experience of raising a child from zero to eighteen.

Episodes.Title: Gold Digger

Episodes.Actors: Nathan Fielder, Isaac Lamb, Vincent Cefalu
Episodes.Plot: While Angela continues to raise her "son," Nathan goes to new lengths to help a man prepare for a difficult conversation.

Episodes.Actors: Nathan Fielder, Journey Baker, Lennon O'Flynn
